attributes.action: Make a mandatory Manslaughter charge for all who carry knives and Guns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rise of gun and knife culture on the streets of the UK is evident the persons carrying them do not care of the light sentencing. We the undersigned propose the PM to make a mandatory Manslaughter sentence for all found carrying a gun or knife as anyone carrying obviously has an intent to use.
